title: Greed, A Most Deadly Sin
description:
We often take our basic needs for granted. Food, water, and shelter come far too easily for many of us. So easy that we want more. More comfort, more luxury, more… everything. Left unchecked, our desire for more can drive us to do very bad things. And those very bad things can have very bad consequences all done for greed, a most deadly sin..

First, lifestyles of the dead and famous
Followed by A killer psychic 
Then, dancing with the dead
Finally in our featured story, a flesh eating beast that hides within

What’s really lurking behind life’s darkest forces? It’s a season full of more questions, more demons and more Evil, exclusively on Paramount+. Head to paramountplus.com/evil to try it FREE!
Find out where to get your COVID-19 vaccine near you at vaccines.gov
Fo to Apostrophe.com/SCARY and click Begin Visit, then use our code SCARY at sign up and you’ll get fifteen dollars off your dermatology visit!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
